channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21887] Multiple implementations of PersistenceManager are on the classpath
item.description:
While writing some test I've just bumped into that PersistenceManager is not always AutoCloseable ; however when I was using it from the metastore it was.

it turned out that:

  • 'standalone-metastore' uses: org.datanucleus:javax.jdo:3.2.0-m3
  • 'metastore' uses: javax.jdo:jdo-api:3.0.1

the problem is that both dependency contains the jdo api; and sometimes jdo-api is earlier on the classpath
item.summary: Multiple implementations of PersistenceManager are on the classpath

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
#1 I think one way to solve this to remove jdo-api from the metastore

gates does that sound good?

+1 overall
